text_block_list.text: ……Today is a joint dance lesson with Twin Turbo. Heading to the park, the meeting spot——

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: ——Let's begin~! With Machitan~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Turbo-sensei's~!

text_block_list.name: Machitan & Turbo
text_block_list.text: Explosive Speed Passion! Dance Lesson~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehehe~. Nice to meet you, Turbo! By the way, why are we at the park today?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Fufufu…… That's because there's a deep reason!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: First…… It's spacious and easy to dance in! Plus, the sunshine feels great!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ooh~, I see! So, what kind of practice are we doing?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: We're gonna…… step like crazy! And then…… get into the rhythm like crazy!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Got it! Then, let's step like crazy and get into the rhythm like crazy~!

text_block_list.name: Machitan & Turbo
text_block_list.text: Tan-tan-tatan-tan……♪
……The meaning of doing this jointly is a mystery, but they seem to be having fun, so it's fine, I thought, as I quietly observed for a while——

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Huh~? It's Machitan-oneechan and Turbo-sensei. What are you doing~?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, hello. Right now, we're practicing dancing.

text_block_list.name: Girl B
text_block_list.text: That looks fun~! Hey hey! We wanna join in too~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Sure thing~. Then let's all dance and sing together~♪

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ooh~, it's gotten lively! Well well, since we have the chance, let's try a new practice!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yeah yeah. Let's do it, let's do it! But, what would be good……?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Assistant Trainer big brother! What do you think we should do here!
choice_data_list: How about combining play and dance?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Assistant Trainer big sister! What do you think we should do here!
choice_data_list: How about combining play and dance?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I see! So we'll learn dance in a fun, natural way!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright then... everyone! Let's play step tag!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Like this, we'll just use steps to run away or chase! How about it~? Anyone wanna play~!

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: Yeah, let's do it~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Then I'll be 'it,' so everyone, make sure to keep the rhythm while you run away!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Alright! Everyone, run away from Machitan~!
And so, through playing with the children, Matikanetannhauser and the others were able to practice their dance steps to their heart's content.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, hmm... In that case, the first thing we should do is... change the lesson title!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Machitan and~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Turbo-sensei's~!

text_block_list.name: Machitan & Turbo
text_block_list.text: Exciting! Good Kids' Dance Classroom~!

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: Yaaay!
It ended up feeling like an educational show... but through teaching, they seemed to have learned the tricks of dance.
